availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant. Maryland native. Married to Elizabeth A. Jefferson. Father of John Jefferson, Henry T. Jefferson, and Ann L. Jefferson. Produce dealer in Jefferson County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, p. 204B-205A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Second District, p. 794.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 3, p. 696.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, 3rd Ward, p. 263A.
